DOC.brief_title: Levonorgestrel Contraceptive Intrauterine Systems ( LCS ) Pearl Index Study
DOC.detailed_description: Drop out-rate cover Participant flow section .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 35 year ( inclusive ) , good general health request contraception . Has regular menstrual cycle ( length cycle 2135 day ) ( i.e. , endogenous cyclicity without hormonal contraceptive use ) . Known suspected pregnancy lactate . History ectopic pregnancy . Any genital infection ( successfully treat ) . Abnormal uterine bleed unknown origin .
